description.construction: 7-Ply Hard Rock Maple - Traditional for a reason. Standard 7-ply wood construction, giving you a deck that is durable, sturdy and poppy without breaking the bank.
description.trucks: Bullet 130 Trucks - Strong, lightweight cast aluminum trucks with quick and stable turning geometry, and a softer 84a high rebound performance cushion for an easy turn. Bullet trucks are guaranteed against breakage.
description.wheels: OJ 52mm 99a Wheels - A 99a durometer makes this wheel best for pools and parks with a bit more grip than softer varieties. Hard enough that sliding is a breeze while soft enough for a smooth roll and plenty of grip.
description.bearings: Bullet ABEC 3 Bearings - ABEC rated chrome steel bearings with smooth-spin oil lubrication for an extended roll.
